caption: The video narrates the tale of a woman using a faux ghost story to seek revenge for her husband's psychological abuse, leading to a series of crime mysteries. In the end, the protagonist unravels the truth, proving it was all a figment of his imagination. Highlights: The protagonist solves the mystery of a fake ghost; the faux ghost story was crafted for revenge against psychological abuse; the protagonist discovers a hidden secret; this case is related to the death of a woman 120 years prior; the protagonist's investigation turns out to be a fantasy; two bodies are found, one of which was substituted; the protagonist is forced to confront his own pain and addiction; the case involves the return of an antagonist; this real-life case requires the cooperation of the protagonist and his friend.
